name: Jason's Coming
description:
Jason's coming to murder you. Will you survive?

Jason's Coming is a single-room text-adventure made in a day to get back into Inform 7.

I will be taking questions now.

Q: How do I play?
A: Click the "Play in Browser" link in the game view and starting typing in commands. if you need more guidance than that. The Home view has a link titled "Introduction to IF". Might be a helpful primer if you're lost.

Q: The "Play In Browser" thing breaks on my phone.
A: Yeah sorry about that. No idea why. Will try fixing sometime soon.

Q: Is this really a serious game? I've been looking for one. I dunno. The cover image looks kinda goofy.
A: Only one way to find out.

Q: Is this a work in progress?
A: Yes, but only insofar as I am still hunting bugs and oddities. I consider it feature complete

Q: Really?
A: That's not a question.

Q: What can you even do in it? It seems kinda small.
A: Well it's just a silly game I slapped together in a day. It has like... 5 endings that aren't you dying or something. Go hunt for those!

Q: Does it have a gun in it?
A: It does. I know. Hack move. Everybody's first proper finished text adventure has a gun in it. But see here, this isn't my first text adventure at all. Hah!

Q: Did that one have a gun in it?
A: I'm done answering questions.
